resources.string: A powerful Raja Yoga formed by the association of Jupiter and Venus in a Kendra from the Moon, indicating great authority and status.
A classic wealth-producing yoga formed by the connection between lords of wealth-related houses (2, 5, 9, 11).
An auspicious yoga for wealth and fortune, formed when Venus is strongly placed in its own or exaltation sign in a Kendra or Trikona house.
A specific wealth yoga formed by the conjunction of Jupiter and Mercury in the 2nd house of wealth.
A powerful yoga for wealth and enterprise, formed by the conjunction of the Moon and Mars.
A yoga for gains and fulfillment of desires, formed by the favorable placement of the 11th lord.
One of the Pancha Mahapurusha Yogas, formed by a strong Mars in a Kendra house. It gives courage, strength, and a commanding personality.
One of the Pancha Mahapurusha Yogas, formed by a strong Mercury in a Kendra house. It bestows intelligence, communication skills, and a youthful appearance.
One of the Pancha Mahapurusha Yogas, formed by a strong Jupiter in a Kendra house. It indicates wisdom, knowledge, and high moral character.
One of the Pancha Mahapurusha Yogas, formed by a strong Venus in a Kendra house. It grants beauty, luxury, artistic talents, and a happy married life.
One of the Pancha Mahapurusha Yogas, formed by a strong Saturn in a Kendra house. It gives authority, land, and a long life, but with significant responsibilities.
A Nabhasa yoga where all planets are in the 1st and 7th houses, indicating a life of balance and relationships.
A Nabhasa yoga where planets occupy the trinal houses (1, 5, 9), indicating fortune and creativity.
A Nabhasa yoga formed by planets in two adjacent Kendra houses, suggesting a life of effort and accumulation of wealth.
A Nabhasa yoga where all planets are in the 1st and 7th houses, leading to a life focused on self and partnerships.
A Nabhasa yoga where all planets are in movable signs, indicating a life of travel and activity.
A Nabhasa yoga where all planets are in fixed signs, indicating a stable but sometimes stubborn nature.
A Nabhasa yoga where all planets are in dual signs, suggesting an intellectual and adaptable personality.
A Nabhasa yoga where all planets are distributed across four signs, indicating a resourceful and prosperous life.
A Nabhasa yoga where all planets are in three signs, which can indicate a life with sharp ups and downs.
A Nabhasa yoga where all planets are in two signs, indicating a focused but potentially polarized life.
A Nabhasa yoga where all planets are in a single sign, indicating a very intense and focused personality.
A Nabhasa yoga where all planets are in seven signs, indicating a skilled, fortunate, and well-rounded individual.
A Chandra Yoga formed by a planet (except the Sun) in the 2nd house from the Moon. It gives wealth and self-made success.
A Chandra Yoga formed by a planet (except the Sun) in the 12th house from the Moon. It gives good character and renunciation.
A Chandra Yoga formed by planets on both sides of the Moon (2nd and 12th houses). It bestows wealth, fame, and comfort.
A powerful and auspicious yoga formed when Jupiter is in a Kendra (1, 4, 7, 10) from the Moon, currently in the %1$dth house. It grants intelligence, fame, and lasting reputation.
A beneficial yoga formed when natural benefics (Jupiter, Venus, Mercury) are in the 6th, 7th, or 8th houses from the Moon. It creates leaders and commanders.
A Solar Yoga formed by a planet in the 2nd house from the Sun. Its effects depend on whether the planet is a benefic or malefic.
A Solar Yoga formed by a planet in the 12th house from the Sun. Its effects depend on the nature of the planet involved.
A Solar Yoga formed by planets on both sides of the Sun (2nd and 12th houses). It indicates a well-balanced and eloquent individual.
A challenging yoga formed when there are no planets in the 2nd or 12th houses from the Moon, indicating potential for loneliness and mental distress if not cancelled.
A yoga indicating financial challenges, formed by the lord of the 11th house (gains) being placed in a Dusthana (6, 8, 12) house.
Ascendant hemmed between malefics in 2nd and 12th houses
Jupiter, Venus, Mercury well-placed with Jupiter strong
Ascendant hemmed between benefics in 2nd and 12th houses
Exalted Lagna lord aspected by Jupiter
Grants high status, authority, and recognition, akin to royalty.
Bestows immense wealth, luxury, and fortune upon the native.
Grants expertise in finance, accounting, and management of wealth.
Leads to wealth through enterprise, courage, and sometimes questionable means.
Facilitates gains and achievement of desires through %1$s.
Makes the person brave, aggressive, and successful in competitive fields like sports or the military.
Creates a person who is intelligent, articulate, and successful in intellectual or business pursuits.
Leads to a life of wisdom, spiritual pursuits, and respect from the community.
Results in a life filled with comfort, beauty, artistic talent, and harmonious relationships.
Gives authority and leadership, often in service-oriented fields, and control over masses.
Middle part of life is happy and prosperous.
Success and prosperity in later life.
Hardworking, wealthy, and may perform sacrificial rites.
Struggles with spouse and sickness; may have a harsh nature.
Leads to a tendency to travel and reside in foreign lands, but can be envious.
Leads to honor, wealth, and a fixed sense of purpose.
Can indicate physical deformity but also skill and determination.
Truthful, wealthy, and engaged in agriculture.
Can bring a sharp, sometimes cruel nature, and a life of struggle.
Can indicate a person who is a heretic or lacks virtue.
Can indicate poverty and sorrow, but also strength and focus.
Skilled in arts, music, and fond of friends.
Self-earned wealth, intelligence, and good reputation.
Good character, health, and a renunciate nature.
Enjoys wealth, vehicles, and is charitable.
Famous, virtuous, intelligent, and holds a lasting reputation.
Leads a life of a commander, minister, or king; enjoys prosperity.
Makes one truthful, prosperous, and noble.
Can cause struggles and association with wicked people.
Makes one intelligent, charitable, and skilled.
Can cause laziness, cruelty, and financial issues.
Eloquent speaker, strong physique, and enjoys royal favor.
Leads to poverty, sorrow, and a feeling of loneliness.
The negative effects are cancelled, and the person may rise high after initial struggles.
Indicates periods of poverty and financial hardship.
Rise to power and authority, leadership position, recognition from government
Strong Raja Yoga through mutual exchange, stable rise to power, lasting authority
Rise through fall of enemies, sudden fortune from unexpected sources, gains through others\' losses
Rise from humble beginnings, success after initial struggles, respected leader
Fluctuating fortune, periods of poverty alternating with wealth
Unorthodox beliefs, breaks from tradition, possible disgrace through teachers/religion
Father-related troubles, ego issues, government problems, health issues with head/eyes
Spiritual detachment, low self-esteem, father troubles, past-life karmic issues
Mental restlessness, mother troubles, emotional instability, obsessive tendencies
Detachment from emotions, past-life memories, psychic sensitivity, mother karma
Accidents, surgery, aggression, sibling troubles, litigation, sudden events
Past-life karma manifesting as chronic obstacles, delays, fear, ancestral issues
Obstacles in self-expression, health challenges, restricted opportunities
Requires mitigation; obstacles in early life, need for protective measures
Exceptional strength, power, and effectiveness in the planet\'s significations
Intelligence, skilled in many arts, famous, sweet speech, scholarly
Pure character, lasting fame, prosperous, ethical conduct, respected by rulers
Highly learned, poet, prose writer, famous speaker, skilled in all arts
King or minister, famous, generous, wealthy, charitable, mountain-like stability
Bold, energetic, leads armies, stubborn, wealthy, fortunate
Protected life, good health, success in endeavors, helpful people around
Renunciation tendencies, spiritual inclinations, detachment from worldly matters
Royal honors, fame, eloquence, learned, respected by rulers
Highly successful career, fortune through profession, fame, authority positions
Karmic life patterns, sudden ups and downs, spiritual transformation potential, delays in %1$s
During Jupiter and Venus Dasha/Antardasha periods.
During the Dasha/Antardasha of the planets involved.
Primarily during the Mahadasha of Venus.
During Jupiter and Mercury Dasha/Antardasha periods.
During Moon and Mars Dasha/Antardasha periods.
Primarily during the Mahadasha of Mars.
Primarily during the Mahadasha of Mercury.
Primarily during the Mahadasha of Jupiter.
Primarily during the Mahadasha of Saturn.
During the Dasha/Antardasha of the Moon.
During Jupiter and Moon Dasha/Antardasha periods.
During the Dasha/Antardasha of the benefic planets involved.
During the Dasha/Antardasha of the Sun.
During Moon\'s Dasha, if the yoga is uncancelled.
Throughout life, especially during malefic Dashas
Rahu and Ketu Mahadashas especially impactful
Throughout life, enhanced during benefic Dashas
Presence of malefic planets on both sides of the Sun.
Aspect from Jupiter or a strong dispositor.
%1$s is strong - Viparita results may be modified
Clean Neecha Bhanga - yoga operates fully
Neecha Bhanga via sign lord in Kendra
Sun in Upachaya house - effects reduced
Sun is strong - mitigates negative effects
Moon is strong - reduces negative effects
Mars is strong - can channel energy positively
Mars in Upachaya - aggression becomes drive
Planet closely conjunct node - partial cancellation
Planet is combust - yoga significantly weakened
